name: UIDragInteraction
desc: An interaction to enable dragging of items from a view, employing a delegate to provide drag items and to respond to calls from the drag session.

items.name: init(delegate: UIDragInteractionDelegate)
items.desc: Initializes a drag interaction object with a custom delegate object.

items.name: var allowsSimultaneousRecognitionDuringLift: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the interaction allows recognition of other gestures during the lift activity.

items.name: var delegate: UIDragInteractionDelegate?
items.desc: An object that configures and controls a drag interaction.

items.name: protocol UIDragInteractionDelegate
items.desc: The interface for configuring and controlling a drag interaction.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether the drag interaction responds to touches and is allowed to participate in a drag activity.

items.name: class var isEnabledByDefault: Bool
items.desc: A device-dependent Boolean value that indicates whether a newly-instantiated drag interaction is allowed to participate in a drag activity.
